document_data.caption: A lesser shadowrath pictured on the left.
document_data.name: Lesser Shadowrath
document_data.mainbody: '''Lesser shadowraths''', which were also called '''blackbones''', were a form of [[undead]] that had a connection with the dangerous [[artifact]] known as the ''[[Crown of Horns]]''.
document_data.Description: These creatures resembled blackened [[skeleton]]s whose eyes glowed with crimson energy.
document_data.Personality: Lesser shadowraths retained their intelligence, but were under the complete control of whoever wore the ''Crown of Horns'' if they were within {{SI|300|ft|long=yes}}.
document_data.Combat:
Any magical or [[psionic]] abilities acquired by a lesser shadowrath during their life were lost upon their transformation. The touch of a lesser shadowrath was similar to the ''[[chill touch]]'' [[spell]], causing physical harm and temporarily draining a bit of the target's strength. Death would result if the target was completely drained of their strength.

These creatures were immune to normal and [[silver]] weapons.
document_data.Society: If uncontrolled, a lesser shadowrath sought to destroy spellcasters or followers of [[Mystra]].
document_data.History: Lesser shadowraths were created by the "ray of undeath" power of the ''Crown of Horns''. The ray of undeath destroyed all non-magical equipment carried by the individual when they were struck. Any [[magic item]]s carried by the individual were simply dropped to the ground and abandoned or collected for the ''Crown'' bearer.
